QuestData.Title: Pets Detective
QuestData.Description:
I'm so glad you're here, $n!
I've been expecting a delivery of pet supplies and some new pets. But my distribution manager, Zantini has not reported in. I suspect foul play.
There's been some shady people eyeballing my store for a while now. But I haven't been able to leave the store and track them down. You can.
Take my pet cat, Fiona, and find these well hidden spies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the city of Dalaran with Breanni's special spy catching cat, Fiona.

Objectives.Objective: Investigate the southern edge of Dalaran with Fiona
